faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our tours and services
faq.howToBook: How do I book a tour?
faq.howToBookAnswer: You can book a tour through our website, by calling us directly, or by visiting our office. We require a deposit to secure your booking, and full payment is due 30 days before departure.
faq.cancellationAnswer: We offer flexible cancellation policies. Cancellations made 60+ days before departure receive a full refund minus processing fees. Cancellations within 30 days may incur additional charges.
faq.payment: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.paymentAnswer: We accept major credit cards, bank transfers, and cash payments. For international bookings, we also accept PayPal and other secure online payment methods.
faq.bestTime: When is the best time to visit Uzbekistan?
faq.bestTimeAnswer: The best time to visit Uzbekistan is during spring (April-May) and autumn (September-October) when temperatures are mild and comfortable for sightseeing.
faq.visa: Do I need a visa to visit Uzbekistan?
faq.visaAnswer: Many countries can enter Uzbekistan visa-free for up to 30 days. We provide detailed visa information and assistance for all our tour participants.
faq.currency: What currency is used in Uzbekistan?
faq.currencyAnswer: The official currency is the Uzbek Som (UZS). US Dollars and Euros are widely accepted, and ATMs are available in major cities.
faq.hotels: What type of accommodation do you provide?
faq.hotelsAnswer: We offer a range of accommodations from boutique hotels to luxury resorts, all carefully selected for comfort, location, and authentic local character.
faq.meals: Are meals included in the tours?
faq.mealsAnswer: Most of our tours include breakfast and some meals featuring local cuisine. Specific meal inclusions are detailed in each tour description.
faq.transportAnswer: We provide comfortable, air-conditioned vehicles with professional drivers. For longer distances, we may use domestic flights or high-speed trains.
